name: Altinity Tool Guidance
content:
Tool use rules
1. Explain why you call a tool then call it.
2. If you say you will call a tool you must call it next.

Discovery tools
Use codebase_search find_by_name grep_search view_file and view_code_item to gather facts about layouts models resources rule handlers and policy.

Edit tool
Use replace_file_content for surgical edits in a single file with precise replacement chunks. Never dump code to the USER unless asked.

Local commands
Use run_command for schema validators small unit tests and formatters. Never include cd. Prefer short blocking runs when you need output.

Browser use
Use browser_preview only after a local server is running and only when a manual UI check is relevant.

Memory
Store repo path common layout files active resource files common model roots and user preferences such as naming.
